channel.title: Super Obstacle Gauntlet
channel.description:
![SOG-Cover4-small|386x500](upload://75HtkzEuqeq4x1LGpD3L83PwX6m.jpeg) Super Obstacle Gauntlet is a GMless one-shot RPG with collaborative and competitive elements.
Play as a competitor in a obstacle course show hosted by the gods! Try to best the other players as you all take turn creating the obstacles. The winner ascends into the heavens, their names never to be forgotten.
Every sale helps pay for classes and competition fees, furthering my daughter's ninja-obstacle dreams!
Now available on [Itch](https://wastelandofenchantment.itch.io/super-obstacle-gauntlet) and [DriveThru](https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/307218/Super-Obstacle-Gauntlet) !
